titleStmt.title: A list of Their Majesties Royal Fleet now actually at sea, with the number of men and guns; also the commanders names.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Amery at the Sign of the Peacock in Fleetstreet and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Sign of the Peacock in Fleetstreet
